title: The YouTuber Who Proudly Faked Tourettes for Clout

media:group.media:title: The YouTuber Who Proudly Faked Tourettes for Clout
media:group.media:description:
There's a new wave of people faking disorders for clout on TikTok, but they all eventually get caught. Today, we look into the story of I'm Tourettes. This creator captured his disorder for millions to see, but past acquaintances have come forward with accusations. He’s come forward with an explanation video and changed identities on social media numerous times, but people aren’t ready to forgive him. Now, he’s back with his truth, admitting to the world what happened behind the scenes. But will he face the consequences of his actions?

This is: The TikToker Who Faked Tourettes For Clout
